Class GameViewController

java.lang.Object
grab.szan.controller.GameViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
public class GameViewController extends Object implements Controller
Controller for the in-game view. Manages the board display, player list, and turn information.

      Sets the board for this game and generates its fields on the provided Pane.

      Initializes UI-related aspects, including click handlers and player list styling.

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      Gets the board instance used by this controller.
      Returns:
      the Board

    • updateTurnLabel

      public void updateTurnLabel(String nickname)
      Updates the turn label to indicate whose turn it is, changing the text color to match that player's color if possible.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player whose turn it is

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String nickname)
      Adds a new player to the list of players and updates the UI.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the new player

    • clearPlayers

      public void clearPlayers()
      Clears the current list of players and updates the UI.

    • changeColor

      public void changeColor(int i, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Changes the color for the player at the specified index in the colors list, then refreshes the ListView to reflect the change.
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the player
      color - the new Color to use

    • getId

      public int getId(String nickname)
      Retrieves the index of a given nickname in the player list.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player's nickname
      Returns:
      the index of the nickname or -1 if not found
